attributes.action: Ban new Council Tax Rates 'So called Peace and Quiet' areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am against the new banding of Council Tax, whereby council officers can come and inspect your homes to see whether you have extended your house, modernise kitchen, bathroom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
